data.eml:eml: Taxonomic study of the Japanese species of the genus Salka Dworakowska (Hemiptera, Cicadellidae, Typhlocybinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ohara, Naomichi (2012): Taxonomic study of the Japanese species of the genus Salka Dworakowska (Hemiptera, Cicadellidae, Typhlocybinae). Zootaxa 3281: 22-40, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.280852
